title: Restrictions
description: Use this section to define restrictions settings

allowCloudAddressBook.description:
If 'false', disables iCloud Address Book services. Available in macOS 10.12 and later.
{"introduced": "10.12", "userenrollment": {"mode": "forbidden"}}

allowCloudBookmarks.description:
If 'false', disables iCloud Bookmark sync. Available in macOS 10.12 and later.
{"introduced": "10.12", "userenrollment": {"mode": "forbidden"}}

allowCloudCalendar.description:
If 'false', disables iCloud Calendar services. Available in macOS 10.12 and later.
{"introduced": "10.12", "userenrollment": {"mode": "forbidden"}}

allowCloudDesktopAndDocuments.description:
If 'false', disables cloud desktop and document services. Available in macOS 10.12.4 and later.
{"introduced": "10.12.4", "userenrollment": {"mode": "forbidden"}}

allowCloudMail.description:
If 'false', disables iCloud Mail services. Available in macOS 10.12 and later.
{"introduced": "10.12", "userenrollment": {"mode": "forbidden"}}

allowCloudNotes.description:
If 'false', disables iCloud Notes services. Available in macOS 10.12 and later.
{"introduced": "10.12", "userenrollment": {"mode": "forbidden"}}

allowCloudReminders.description:
If 'false', disables iCloud Reminder services. Available in macOS 10.12 and later.
{"introduced": "10.12", "userenrollment": {"mode": "forbidden"}}

allowContentCaching.description:
If 'false', disables content caching. As of 10.13.4 this is included in the content caching payload. Available in macOS 10.13 and later.
{"introduced": "10.13", "userchannel": false, "userenrollment": {"mode": "forbidden"}}

allowiTunesFileSharing.description:
If 'false', disables iTunes file sharing services. Available in macOS 10.13 and later.
{"introduced": "10.13", "userenrollment": {"mode": "forbidden"}}

allowUniversalControl.description:
If 'false', disables Universal Control. Available in macOS 13 and later.
{"introduced": "13.0", "userenrollment": {"mode": "forbidden"}}

forceDelayedAppSoftwareUpdates.description:
If 'true', delays user visibility of non-OS Software Updates. Requires a supervised device.
Visibility of Operating System updates is controlled through 'forceDelayedSoftwareUpdates'.
The delay is 30 days unless 'enforcedSoftwareUpdateDelay' is set to another value.
Available in macOS 11 and later.
{"introduced": "11.0", "userenrollment": {"mode": "forbidden"}}

ratingRegion.description: The two-letter key that profile tools use to display the proper ratings for the given region. This data isn't recognized or reported by the client.
